name: squelch-tabs-and-accordions-shortcodes
description: Shortcodes for creating accordions, horizontal accordions and tabs.
author: Matt Lowe <hi@squelchdesign.com>

scripts.build:css: postcss css/squelch-tabs-and-accordions.css >build-1.css && node_modules/minify/bin/minify.js build-1.css >build-2.css && mv build-2.css css/squelch-tabs-and-accordions.min.css && rm build-*.css
scripts.build:js: cd js ; uglifyjs --warn --verbose --compress --mangle --output squelch-tabs-and-accordions.min.js squelch-tabs-and-accordions.js ; uglifyjs --warn --verbose --compress --mangle --output squelch-tabs-and-accordions-admin.min.js squelch-tabs-and-accordions-admin.js
scripts.build:js:dev: cd js ; uglifyjs --warn --verbose --compress --mangle --source-map "url='squelch-tabs-and-accordions.min.js.map'" --output squelch-tabs-and-accordions.min.js squelch-tabs-and-accordions.js ; uglifyjs --warn --verbose --compress --mangle --source-map "url='squelch-tabs-and-accordions-admin.min.js.map'" --output squelch-tabs-and-accordions-admin.min.js squelch-tabs-and-accordions-admin.js
